# How to Download and Install Sigmatek LASAL CLASS Software
 
Sigmatek LASAL CLASS is a software suite that allows you to create, program, and simulate complex automation solutions for industrial applications. With Sigmatek LASAL CLASS, you can design graphical user interfaces, control logic, motion sequences, safety functions, and more. In this article, we will show you how to download and install Sigmatek LASAL CLASS software on your PC.
 
## sigmatek lasal class software download


[**Download File**](https://www.google.com/url?q=https%3A%2F%2Fcinurl.com%2F2tKovx&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw2mp5eneoCppSVHzGj-tFcc)

 
## Step 1: Download Sigmatek LASAL CLASS Software
 
To download Sigmatek LASAL CLASS software, you need to register on the Sigmatek website and request a license key. You can do this by following these steps:
 
- Go to [https://www.sigmatek-automation.com/en/downloads/lasal-class/](https://www.sigmatek-automation.com/en/downloads/lasal-class/) and click on the "Register" button.
- Fill in the registration form with your personal and company details and click on "Submit".
- Check your email for a confirmation link and click on it to activate your account.
- Log in to your account and go to the "Downloads" section.
- Click on the "Request License Key" button and fill in the license request form with your PC name and MAC address.
- Check your email for a license key file and save it on your PC.
- Click on the "Download LASAL CLASS" button and choose the version that matches your operating system (Windows 10 or Windows 7).
- Save the installation file on your PC.

## Step 2: Install Sigmatek LASAL CLASS Software
 
To install Sigmatek LASAL CLASS software, you need to run the installation file and follow the instructions on the screen. You can do this by following these steps:

- Locate the installation file on your PC and double-click on it to start the installation wizard.
- Choose the language for the installation and click on "Next".
- Read and accept the license agreement and click on "Next".
- Choose the destination folder for the installation and click on "Next".
- Select the components you want to install and click on "Next".
- Browse for the license key file that you received by email and click on "Next".
- Click on "Install" to begin the installation process.
- Wait for the installation to complete and click on "Finish".

## Step 3: Launch Sigmatek LASAL CLASS Software
 
To launch Sigmatek LASAL CLASS software, you need to find the shortcut icon on your desktop or start menu and double-click on it. You can do this by following these steps:

- Find the Sigmatek LASAL CLASS icon on your desktop or start menu and double-click on it to launch the software.
- Choose the language for the software and click on "OK".
- Select the project type you want to create or open an existing project.
- Start designing, programming, and simulating your automation solution with Sigmatek LASAL CLASS.
